channel.title: Travels India on MyThinkPond

item.title: Interesting pics from our trip to India
item.description: Interesting pics from our trip to India I took this shot from a higher elevation against the backdrop of the Gopura (vimana) of our ancestral family temple in Kaniyur, Tamil Nadu, India. Google photo animation stitched the pictures to create the animation.
